feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-12T22:01:21.523592Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;显示 HN：Non.io，一个我在过去 4 年一直致力于开发的类似 Reddit 的平台</stitle>; <id>;https://non.io</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T16:59:43.357952Z</updated>; <link href="https://non.io"/>; <author>; <name>;jjcm</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jjcm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://non.io/lib/images/tag-example.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：167px；" />;<br />;Non.io 是一个基于订阅的平台，旨在通过提供无广告或跟踪器的高质量用户体验来支持创作者。用户的投票是有价值的，该平台的资金来自订阅而非广告收入。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-non-io-a-reddit-like-platform-ive-been-working-on-for-the-last-4-years" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36296695" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;理解 DeepMind 的排序算法</stitle>; <id>;https:// justine.lol/sorting/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T17:59:43.358566Z</updated>; <link href="https://justine.lol/sorting/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jart</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jart</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://贾斯汀.lol/sorting/deepmind.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：209px；" />;<br />;DeepMind 将他们的深度学习知识应用于超优化学科，发现了用于排序算法的更细小的内核，可以提高排序网络的效率。他们还为 LLVM libcxx 做出了开源贡献，以优化排序算法的代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#understanding-deepmind-s-sorting-algorithm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36297476" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;德国的利润价格螺旋上升</stitle>; <id>;https://think.ing.com/articles/never-waste-a-good-crisis-a-profit -price-spiral-germany/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T20:59:43.359055Z</updated>; <link href="https://think.ing.com/articles/never-waste-a -good-crisis-a-profit-price-spiral-germany/"/>; <author>; <name>;rustoo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rustoo</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-profit-price-spiral-in-germany" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36300209" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国专利局提议制定规则，使扼杀不良专利变得更加困难</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.techdirt.com/2023/06/08/us-patent-office-proposes-rule-to-make-it-much-harder-to-kill-bad-patents/</id>; <更新>;2023- 06-12T20:59:43.359546Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.techdirt.com/2023/06/08/us-patent-office-proposes-rule-to-make-it-much -harder-to-kill-bad-patents/"/>; <author>; <name>;berkeleyjunk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=berkeleyjunk</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.techdirt.com/wp-content/themes/techdirt/assets/images/footer-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;美国专利局提出了新的规则，这将使通过多方审查 (IPR) 程序挑战不良专利变得更加困难，该程序允许任何人挑战专利并让其审查专利审判和上诉委员会。拟议的变更将限制谁可以提出挑战以及哪些专利可以受到挑战，从而可能为专利流氓提供新的保护。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-patent -office-proposes-rule-to-make-it-much-harder-to-kill-bad-patents" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36300958" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;使用 Elixir 编写脚本</stitle>; <id>;https://underjord.io/scripting-with-elixir.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T19:59： 43.359992Z</updated>; <link href="https://underjord.io/scripting-with-elixir.html"/>; <author>; <name>;lawik</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=lawik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://underjord.io/img/logo2.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;作者建议使用任何最适合编写脚本的语言，但发现自从引入 Mix.install 以来 Elixir 出奇的好。Elixir 的语法主要是基本的函数调用和 bang 函数制作方便的管道。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scripting-with-elixir" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36289580" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;Pixelfed 推出从 Instagram 导入</stitle>; <id>;https://pixelfed.blog/p/2023/feature/introducing-import-from-instagram</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T16:59:43.360433Z</更新>; <link href="https://pixelfed.blog/p/2023/feature/introducing-import-from-instagram"/>; <author>; <name >;拉普尼</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rapnie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pixelfed .blog/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Favatar.d21b0f04.png&w=3840&q=75" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Pixelfed 推出了一项新功能，允许用户将他们的 Instagram 内容直接导入 Pixelfed，包括照片、标题和主题标签。从 Instagram 导入功能旨在简化保存和保存的过程继续用户在 Pixelfed 社区中的体验。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pixelfed-introduces-import-from-instagram" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36296282" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国公开向所有公民囤积污垢</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com/story/odni -commercially-available-information-report/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T20:59:43.360869Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/odni-commercially -available-information-report/"/>; <author>; <name>;benwerd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benwerd</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/64874ce9f2de86183cf5b4ae/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/stockpile_data_sec_GettyImages-1413768537.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;根据导演自己的专家小组最新解密的一份报告，美国政府一直在秘密收集其公民的“敏感和私密信息”。该报告警告说，政府的静态解释构成“公开可用信息”的内容对公众构成重大威胁，并且政府认为它可以“持续”跟踪“数百万美国人”的电话而无需搜查令，只要它为信息付费。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-us-is-openly-stockpiling-dirt-on-all-its-citizens" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36300410" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：用于 2D 游戏的稳定扩散驱动的关卡编辑器</stitle>; <id>;https://generalrobots.substack.com/p/ dimension-hopper-part-1</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T15:59:43.361324Z</updated>; <link href="https://generalrobots.substack.com/p/dimension-hopper-part -1"/>; <author>; <name>;robobenjie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=robobenjie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic %2Fimages%2F202a3728-a647-45ad-b415-16f235b3f9b3_1472x880.png" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;作者描述了他们创建一个 2D 平台游戏的项目，玩家可以在其中设计自己的关卡，而生成式 AI 将创建漂亮的渲染图像来表示关卡。他们尝试不同的模型和技术来改进输出质量。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-stable-diffusion-powered-level-editor-for-a-2d-game" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36295227" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;每个签名都被破坏：Microsoft Office 的 Ooxml 签名不安全</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.usenix.org/conference/usenixsecurity23/presentation/rohlmann</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T12:59:43.361703Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.usenix.org/ conference/usenixsecurity23/presentation/rohlmann"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudotrash</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudotrash</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;安全研究人员发现 Microsoft Office 的 OOXML 签名中验证数字签名的方式存在重大安全漏洞，攻击者可以在修改已签名文档中的内容的同时仍然显示签名有效。这些攻击影响所有经过测试的 Office 版本，甚至可以创建通用签名伪造攻击。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#every-signature-is-broken-insecurity-of-microsoft-offices-ooxml-signatures" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36292413" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;逃离硅谷（计算的另类愿景）</stitle>; <id>;https://monroelab.net/escape-from- silicon-valley-alternative-visions-of-computation</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T18:59:43.362070Z</updated>; <link href="https://monroelab.net/escape-from-silicon -valley-alternative-visions-of-computation"/>; <author>; <name>;jrepinc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrepinc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://monroelab.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Star-Trek-AI-Analysis.png" style="宽度：220px；高度： 125 像素；" />;<br />;本文讨论了大型语言模型系统（如 ChatGPT）的浪费潜力以及对替代计算愿景的需求。它表明，星际迷航等科幻小说为通用的统一计算模型提供了更富有成效的愿景。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#escape-from-silicon-valley-alternative-visions-of-computation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36298655" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;杀戮社区</stitle>; <id>;https://www.marginalia.nu/log/82_killing_community</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 12T17:59:43.362426Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.marginalia.nu/log/82_killing_community"/>; <author>; <name>;dasil003</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=dasil003</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;“杀死社区”理论表明，持续大量涌入的陌生人会破坏在线社区，将它们变成存在的地方混蛋是常态，没有归属感。对于任何以风险投资模式运行的社交媒体来说，这是不可避免的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#killing-community" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36296882" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;启动 HN: DevCycle (YC W14) – 一个为开发者构建的功能标志平台</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36295460</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-12T17:59:43.362786Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36295460"/>; <author>; <name>;cdrux</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cdrux</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;DevCycle是一个功能标志平台，旨在解决开发者体验和代码可维护性的核心问题.它将功能视为高度可扩展的远程配置，并提供工具来轻松跟踪、检测和消除不必要的技术债务。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-devcycle-yc-w14-a-feature-flag-platform-b​​uilt-for-developers" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36295460" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Edge 将您在线查看的图像发送到 Microsoft</stitle>; <id>;https://www.neowin.net/新闻/edge-sends-images-you-view-online-to-microsoft-here-is-how-to-disable-that/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T15:59:43.363150Z</updated >; <link href="https://www.neowin.net/news/edge-sends-images-you-view-online-to-microsoft-here-is-how-to-disable-that/"/>; <作者>; <name>;8organicbits</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=8organicbits</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn.neowin.com/news/images/uploaded/2023/04/1682582580_microsoft_edge_story.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Microsoft Edge 有一个内置的图像增强工具，可以将图像链接发送给 Microsoft，而不是在设备上进行增强，从而引发隐私问题。即将推出的 Edge 更新将允许用户指定 Edge 不应处理的网站。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#edge-sends-images-you-view-online-to-microsoft" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36295364" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：FlingUp，我在过去 2 年中一直在构建的类似 Reddit 的平台</stitle>; <id>;https://flingup.com< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T19:59:43.363498Z</updated>; <link href="https://flingup.com"/>; <author>; <name>;dt3ft</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dt3ft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;人们聚集在一起分享和讨论链接、照片、新闻、故事、视频和任何东西的地方否则他们会觉得 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-flingup-a-reddit-like-platform-ive-been-building-for-the-last-2-years" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36299904" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Melange 1.0：将 OCaml / ReasonML 编译成 JavaScript</stitle>; <id >;https://buttondown.email/anmonteiro/archive/melange-hits-v10/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T16:59:43.363843Z</更新>; <link href="https://buttondown .email/anmonteiro/archive/melange-hits-v10/"/>; <author>; <name>;anmonteiro90</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anmonteiro90</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://buttondown.email/static/images/icons/icon-square@400.png" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;Melange 1.0，一种将 OCaml 编译为 JavaScript 的工具，已经发布，重点是稳健性、兼容性和开发人员体验。该版本包括 Dune 集成、新的文档工作和支持对于更广泛的 OCaml 版本。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#melange-1-0-compile-ocaml-reasonml-to-javascript" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36296185" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;EasyPost (YC S13) 正在招聘</stitle>; <id>;https://www.easypost.com/careers </id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T17:59:43.364212Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.easypost.com/careers"/>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.easypost.com/assets/images/redesign/people_01.ec5d91d8df990758457e9ab74069091f.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 206px;" />;<br />;我们的问题解决团队为航运物流带来了现代方法。我们跨部门协作，提出具有挑战性的问题，探索新的解决方案，并对我们的成败负责。作为行业专家，我们的工作不仅是帮助我们的客户了解这个行业，而且要定义它的发展方向。我们正在寻找平易近人、充满活力、有创造力、聪明且可靠的候选人加入我们的团队开启航运的未来。现代、灵活的技术如何改善航运的客户体验？如果每个企业都能够提供当日航运会怎样？如果我们所有的货运都整合成一个，将从环境中清除多少废物每周送货？在 EasyPost，我们正在寻找这些问题以及更多问题的答案。我们是一群充满激情的有趣企业家，他们构建了我们自己的革命性软件，旨在简化运输。EasyPost 最初是一名工程师第一家公司，我们为拥有务实的软件开发方法而感到自豪。我们的团队拥有从初创公司到大型科技公司的丰富多样的经验和不同的背景。在过去的 3 年里，我从我们的同事那里学到了惊人的东西，并且拥有了迄今为止我职业生涯中最好的经历。当我在这种环境中工作，与如此才华横溢、知识渊博的队友一起工作时，我真的很茁壮成长，并且非常有动力帮助 EasyPost 取得更大的成功。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#easypost-yc-s13-is-hiring" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;地球自转，相机锁定在天空而不是地面</stitle>; <id>;https: //mastodon.social/@coreyspowell/110531182569820738</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T19:59:43.364527Z</updated>; <link href="https://mastodon.social/@coreyspowell/110531182569820738"/ >; <author>; <name>;behnamoh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=behnamoh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://files.mastodon.social/media_attachments/files/110/531/170/394/593/980/small/d1bf3e6b16dabab2.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;附件：1 张地球自转 24 小时的图像，相机锁定天空而不是地面。我们都在这块旋转的岩石上闲逛。 Bartosz Wojczyński 的精彩视频。 https://artuniverse.eu/gallery/190705-rotation24h #nature #wonder #earth <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#earth-s-rotation-with-the-camera-locked-to -the-sky-instead-of-the-ground" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36299325" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;权力编写编码日志（2014 年）</stitle>; <id>;http://thomasburette.com/blog/2014/06/25/the-power-of-keeping-a-coding-journal/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T14:59:43.364874Z</更新>; <link href="http://thomasburette.com/blog/2014/06/25/the-power-of-keeping-a-coding-journal /"/>; <author>; <name>;jstrieb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jstrieb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;保持编码日志对开发人员来说非常有价值，可以让他们记下编码过程中出现的悬而未决的问题和危险信号。日志可用于识别并跳回到上一段代码，也可以成为编写文档的好工具。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-power-of-keeping-a-coding-journal-2014" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36293752" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cloudflare 有问题</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cloudflarestatus.com</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T15： 59:43.365219Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.cloudflarestatus.com"/>; <author>; <name>;Kuinox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=Kuinox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Cloudflare 提供订阅服务，以更新其各种产品的可用性问题，包括 R2、Waiting Room、Durable Objects、Queues、Stream Live 和单个文件 CDN 缓存清除。他们还为他们的服务提供系统状态，其中包括他们的边缘网络和用于管理的仪表板/API。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cloudflare-is-having-issues" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36294750" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;桌面 Linux 强化（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://privsec.dev/posts/linux/desktop-linux-hardening/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -12T10:59:43.365563Z</updated>; <link href="https://privsec.dev/posts/linux/desktop-linux-hardening/"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://privsec.dev/images/fedora-tux .png" style="宽度：220px；高度：233px；" />;<br />;Linux 桌面操作系统本身并不安全，但可以采取一些措施来加强它们并改善隐私。这些步骤包括启用全盘加密、使用加密交换或 ZRAM、降低可跟踪性以及实施沙盒解决方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#desktop-linux-hardening-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36291169" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;21 世纪的编辑应该远离 20 世纪的书籍</stitle>; <id>;https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2023/06/12/books- editing-retouching-free-expression/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T17:59:43.365910Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2023/06/ 12/books-editing-retouching-free-expression/"/>; <作者>; <name>;CrankyBear</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CrankyBear</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-apps/imrs.php?src=https://s3.amazonaws.com/arc-authors/washpost /7dc354df-55ea-443d-997f-3582e1d3aa5d.jpg&w=196&h=196" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;出版商和文学产业正在更新深受喜爱的小说以删除攻击性语言，但这威胁到言论自由和历史诚实。相反，原创作品应该附有上下文和批判性介绍，以解释有害的语言和作者的个人偏见。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#21st-century-editors-should-keep-their-hands-off-of-20th-century-books" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36297413" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;领导艺术：来自 Art Blakey 的教训</stitle>; <id>;https://albertcory50.substack.com /p/the-art-of-leadership-lessons-from</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T20:59:43.366260Z</更新>; <link href="https://albertcory50.substack.com/ p/the-art-of-leadership-lessons-from"/>; <author>; <name>;AlbertCory</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=AlbertCory</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack- post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F3928a25e-ea94-4323-897d-8962a7f07ce8_600x600.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了可以从爵士乐传奇人物 Art Blakey 那里学到的领导力课程，特别是在指导和创建成功团队方面。作者强调了为演讲做准备的重要性，而不是让领导全靠自己。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-art-of-leadership-lessons-from-art-blakey" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36288618" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一种新的反垄断原则</stitle>; <id>;https://www.platformonomics.com/2023/04/a-new-antitrust-doctrine/ </id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T18:59:43.366612Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.platformonomics.com/2023/04/a-new-antitrust-doctrine/"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;timsneath</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timsneath</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://www.platformonomics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/image-26.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了不同的反垄断思想流派及其执法和决策方法。它还探讨了时髦反托拉斯运动的兴起及其对当前反托拉斯政策的影响，特别是在技术行业方面。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-new-antitrust-doctrine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36298891" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;一个意外中断的故事：我没有亚马逊的一周</stitle>; <id>;https://medium.com/@bjax_/a-tale-of-unwanted-disruption-my-week -without-amazon-df1074e3818b</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T18:59:43.366964Z</更新>; <link href="https://medium.com/@bjax_/a-tale-of-unwanted -disruption-my-week-without-amazon-df1074e3818b"/>; <author>; <name>;josephcsible</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=josephcsible</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1024/1*Kge-FipnWpJqcOrFXEE6NA.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220 像素；" />;<br />;作者经历了长达一周的亚马逊账户锁定，导致他们的智能家居设备无响应。停工是由作者的门铃向亚马逊送货司机发出的种族主义言论的虚假报告引发的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-tale-of-unwanted-disruption-my-week-without-amazon" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36296250" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开发者对 Vision Pro 的看法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.david-smith.org/blog/2023/06/ 12/new-post/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T17:59:43.367333Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.david-smith.org/blog/2023/06/ 12/new-post/"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;作者在体验了 Apple 的新平台 Vision Pro 的高保真度、响应能力和性能后，讨论了他们为 Apple 新平台 Vision Pro 开发的兴奋之情。他们相信，作为新平台的“第一天”开发人员可以促进个人和业务的发展，尽管随之而来的是不确定性和挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-developer-s-view-of-vision-pro" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36297477" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 /etc/hosts 阻止广告软件和恶意软件</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/StevenBlack/hosts</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-12T13:59:43.367678Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/StevenBlack/hosts"/>; <author>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StevenBlack/hosts/master/.github /logo.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：76px；" />;<br />;这篇文章描述了一个存储库，它整合了信誉良好的主机文件，并将它们合并到一个统一的主机文件中，并删除了重复项。存储库提供各种定制的主机文件和扩展，可以与基本主机文件结合使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#block-adware-and-malware-with-etc-hosts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36293026" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1980 年代早期 Datsun/Nissan 语音警报留声机 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6hJBko3- oV4</id>; <更新>;2023-06-12T15:59:43.368022Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6hJBko3-oV4"/>; <作者>; <name>;mean_mistreater</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mean_mistreater</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www .youtube.com/embed/6hJBko3-oV4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#early-1980s-datsun-nissan -voice-alert-phonograph-unit-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36289424" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apache APISIX 怎么样快吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://api7.ai/blog/how-is-apisix-fast</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T18:59:43.368363Z</updated>; <link href ="https://api7.ai/blog/how-is-apisix-fast"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.apiseven.com/uploads/2023/06/08/L0HjyWGM_apisix-vs-kong-light.png? imageMogr2/format/webp" style="width: 220px; height: 167px;" />;<br />;Apache APISIX 是一个高性能的云原生 API 网关，它使用 etcd 进行配置存储，使用哈希表进行 IP 地址匹配，使用基数树进行高效的路由匹配。这些特性让 APISIX 可以维护在处理大量流量时达到最佳性能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-is-apache-apisix-fast" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36289729" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“smolnet”，为朋友和朋友的朋友打造</stitle>; <id>;https://communitywiki.org/wiki/SmolNet</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T12:59:43.368715Z</updated>; <link href="https://communitywiki.org/wiki/SmolNet"/>; <author>; <name>;rglullis</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rglullis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://communitywiki.org/pics/comwiki7- 150.png" style="width: 220px; height: 179px;" />;<br />;The "smol" net is a small network built for friends and friends of friends, with a plan to limit growth and prioritize simplicity. It encourages hosting by real people rather than corporations and offers an alternative to the corporate-dominated internet. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-smolnet-build-for-friends-and-friends-of-friends" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36292078" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lingering effects of Neanderthal DNA found in modern humans</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-06-lingering-effects-neanderthal-dna-modern.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-12T20:59:43.369055Z</updated>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-06-lingering-effects-neanderthal-dna-modern.html"/>; <author>; <name>;wglb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/lingering-effects-of-n.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 100px;" />;<br />;A new study has found that some Neanderthal genes are responsible for certain traits in modern humans, including several with a significant influence on the immune system and metabolism. However, overall, modern genes are winning out over successive generations. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lingering-effects-of-neanderthal-dna-found-in-modern-humans" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
